channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CXF-5853] Mutlipart JAXB model + InputStream using JacksonJsonProvider cause NPE
item.description:

item.summary: Mutlipart JAXB model + InputStream using JacksonJsonProvider cause NPE

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This was caused by the same thread injecting a context and then, while processing another entity which is not supported by Jackson, setting the context to null too early - but when the original entity was processed afterwards we were getting NPE.
